title: Dr. Emanuele Giorgi
text:
I am an Associate Professor in Biostatistics and Head of the Centre for Health Informatics, Computing, and Statistics (CHICAS) at Lancaster University. My research centers on the development of statistical methodologies driven by public health problems, with a special focus on tropical disease mapping.



Spatial and spatio-temporal modeling

Geostatistical methods for disease mapping for global health

Point process models
Statistical methods for serological data

For a comprehensive overview of my academic and professional journey, you can access my full CV.
